column1: Smoque BBQ////Service was exceptional. Especially as newbies
column2: we felt very comfortable. Even during our short wait in line
column3: we were assured that a table would be waiting for us after placing our order. During our meal
column4: we were asked if we needed anything. Staff ended up getting a to-go box for us
column5: even though we were right next to them. They even suggested and gave us a separate bag for the sauces and sides in case of spillage. Also
column6: we did not have to wait long at all for our food to be ready.
